CONTRACT_ID: Battery Electric Transit Bus RFP M9062-233689
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires 2 Battery Electric Transit Buses to be delivered in Regina, SK. Canada.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Request for Proposal: Battery Electric Transit Bus
### Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit a proposal for the procurement of two (2) Battery Electric Transit Buses. The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is the end-user of these buses, which will be delivered to Regina, SK, Canada.

#### Key Tender Details

| **Field** | **Value** |
|---|---|
| **Solicitation Number** | WS3784125814 |
| **Notice Type** | Request for Proposal |
| **Procurement Category** | Goods and Services (GD) |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Open bidding |
| **Selection Criteria** | Lowest Price |
| **End-User Entity** | Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) |
| **Regions of Delivery** | Saskatchewan, Regina |
| **Trade Agreements** | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) |
| **Contact Information** | Jacques Legault, jacques.legault@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca |

#### Tender Description
The successful bidder must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission on or before April 24, 2023, by 14:00 EST. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive. The scope of work includes the delivery of two (2) Battery Electric Transit Buses to Regina, SK.

#### Important Details
Please visit the following URL to access the tender notice and supporting documentation: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15301422?extsite=MTUzMDE0MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15301422?extsite=MTUzMDE0MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Closing Date and Time
All bids must be submitted on or before April 24, 2023, by 14:00 EST. Failure to meet this deadline will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Please contact Jacques Legault if you have any questions or concerns regarding this tender notice. [jacques.legault@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jacques.legault@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
